001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
013import java.util.LinkedList;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Set;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021public class RecursionCollectingNodeItemVisitor
022    extends AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor<Void, Void> {
023
024  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
025  @NonNull
026  private final Map<IAssemblyDefinition, AssemblyRecord> assemblyAnalysis = new LinkedHashMap<>();
027
028  /**
029   * Get the identified assembly definitions that recurse.
030   *
031   * @return the definitions that recurse
032   * @see AssemblyRecord#isRecursive()
033   */
034  @NonNull
035  public Set<AssemblyRecord> getRecursiveAssemblyDefinitions() {
036    return ObjectUtils.notNull(assemblyAnalysis.values().stream()
037        .filter(AssemblyRecord::isRecursive)
038        .collect(Collectors.toSet()));
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Visit the provided module.
043   *
044   * @param module
045   *          the Metaschema module to visit
046   */
047  public void visit(@NonNull IModule module) {
048    visitMetaschema(INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module), null);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem item, Void context) {
053    IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
054
055    // get the assembly record from the cache
056    AssemblyRecord record = assemblyAnalysis.get(definition);
057    if (record == null) {
058      record = new AssemblyRecord(definition);
059      assemblyAnalysis.put(definition, record);
060    } else if (isDecendant(item, definition)) {
061      record.markRecursive();
062      record.addLocation(item);
063    }
064    return super.visitAssembly(item, context);
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem item, Void context) {
069    return visitAssembly((IAssemblyNodeItem) item, context);
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  protected Void defaultResult() {
074    return null;
075  }
076
077  public static final class AssemblyRecord {
078    @NonNull
079    private final IAssemblyDefinition definition;
080    private boolean recursive; // false
081    @NonNull
082    private final List<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> locations = new LinkedList<>();
083
084    private AssemblyRecord(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
085      this.definition = definition;
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Get the definition associated with the record.
090     *
091     * @return the definition
092     */
093    @NonNull
094    public IAssemblyDefinition getDefinition() {
095      return definition;
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Determine if the definition associated with the record is a descendant of
100     * itself.
101     *
102     * @return {@code true} if the definition is a descendant of itself or
103     *         {@code false} otherwise
104     */
105    public boolean isRecursive() {
106      return recursive;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Mark the record as recursive.
111     *
112     * @see #isRecursive()
113     */
114    private void markRecursive() {
115      recursive = true;
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Get the node locations where the definition associated with this record is
120     * used.
121     *
122     * @return the node locations
123     */
124    @NonNull
125    public List<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> getLocations() {
126      return locations;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Associate the provided location with the definition associated with the
131     * record.
132     *
133     * @param location
134     *          the location to associate
135     */
136    public void addLocation(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> location) {
137      this.locations.add(location);
138    }
139  }
140
141}
